overview:
SMERC is an award winning mobile and social game design studio and industry leader in creating vibrant, provocative experiences that captivate and consume a playerâ€™s attention.

SMERC is forging a new approach to the way people are entertained across all the places and devices they play.

Dedicating themselves to cross channel, connected, innovative content, SMERC produces games that shine as examples of independent development, reaching avid entertainment consumers at every level. A leader in independent intellectual property development, SMERC also produces games that enhance and expand brand presence for many industries.
